long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience web pages in a novel way! The "India to Bharat Converter" Chrome extension automatically transforms the word "India" to "Bharat" and "Indian" to "Bharatiye" as you browse. A delightful and playful take on viewing content, this extension offers a fresh perspective on familiar terms.

Disclaimer: This extension is designed purely for entertainment and fun. It does not seek to promote any particular viewpoint, nor does it aim to undermine or disrespect anyone's sentiments or beliefs. It's all in good spirits! If you find joy in experimenting with the way you view web content, give this extension a try.
